title: Team Meeting
description: Weekly team meeting to discuss project progress and upcoming tasks. All team members are required to attend and be prepared to share updates on their assigned tasks.

title: Client Presentation
description: Presentation of the new product features to the client. Make sure all demos are working properly and prepare for Q&A session.

title: Project Deadline
description: Final deadline for the current project phase. All deliverables must be completed and submitted by the end of the day.

title: Company Holiday
description: Company-wide holiday. Office will be closed.

title: Training Workshop
description: Two-day training workshop on new technologies and methodologies. Bring your laptop and note-taking materials.

title: Product Launch
description: Official launch of our new product. Marketing team will coordinate press releases and social media announcements.

title: Code Review
description: Code review session for the new features. All developers should have their code ready for review.

title: Annual Conference
description: Annual industry conference. Several team members will be presenting papers and representing the company.

title: Budget Planning
description: Meeting to plan the budget for the next quarter. Department heads should prepare their budget proposals.

title: Team Building Event
description: Team building activity to improve collaboration and morale. Casual dress code, lunch will be provided.
